events.name: Let's explore Altspace VR together
events.description:
Altspace VR is one of the pioneering Social VR networks. Its built ground up for VR and aims to provide a cutting edge platform for social interactions. In our first meetup we will explore this magical universe together. More information and detailed instructions will be sent to the attendees later ... Update 1: Hello guys !!! really excited for this first virtual meetup. As I have explained earlier , through the social VR mixer we will explore new social VR networks which are coming up. The first one is Altspace VR , here is what you need to do.. Head to www.altvr.com and download their software after making an account. Once you log in you will be asked to choose an avatar and then you can enter their virtual rooms. If you have an oculus rift as some of the social VR mixer members do , please connect it for a fully immersive experience. If you don't have a rift , dont worry the rooms will open up on your computer screen and you can easily navigate your avatars through it. I will wait for you at the main reception virtual room, lets all meet there ..then we can explore further. Since this is the first meetup we will be keeping it simple , just navigating around and chatting about Virtual Reality in a virtual space ... 


** Please check the terms & condition on the individual sites before downloading or registering , Social VR Mixer is just an informal gathering to explore new and upcoming social VR networks we are not affiliated to any of them in any way.
